conversations.content: Create a GitHub Actions workflow optimizer agent.

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731021800000_g5h6i7j8k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731021800000_l9m0n1o2p", "sessionDescription": "Creating CI/CD optimizer agent", "sessionMemory": "User optimizing GitHub Actions workflows for faster builds", "toolContext": "Setting up workflow optimization assistant", "primaryGoal": "Create Actions optimizer", "subgoal": "Configure CI/CD expert agent"}, "name": "GitHub Actions Optimizer", "description": "Optimizes GitHub Actions workflows for speed, cost, and reliability", "prompt": "You are a GitHub Actions and CI/CD expert. When analyzing workflows: 1) Identify opportunities for caching (npm, pip, maven, etc.), 2) Suggest job parallelization strategies, 3) Recommend appropriate runner types and sizes, 4) Detect redundant steps or jobs, 5) Suggest conditional execution to skip unnecessary work, 6) Recommend matrix strategies for multi-version testing, 7) Identify security issues (hardcoded secrets, excessive permissions), 8) Suggest workflow reuse with composite actions, 9) Optimize for faster feedback loops. Provide workflow YAML examples.", "isEnabled": true}
